Author: katarina-stratford
Text: You can absolutely be aware of your disordered behaviour and still have said disorder.   I have BPD. I *know* my behaviours/emotional response/whatever is 'wrong'. That doesn't mean i can turn it off/am not disordered.

Author: fac_ade
Text: SAME, like literally same. This self awareness is currently the biggest reason for why I doubt I have an ED to begin with tbh, I feel fake like I'm doing it for attention or something cause I'm aware of what I'm doing and I know it's bad for me and stuff, yet i keep doing it so :))
